description: Beautiful, spacious apt in the heart of GP with a lot of BK charm. Fully eq. kitchen, big sunny windows, new wooden floors. Perfect BK experience, surrounded by the best parks, bars, restaurants & boutiques BK has to offer such as Alameda, Lobster Joint, Bakeri, Eastern District, and Eagle Trading Company. You’ll love my place because of the comfy bed and the cozy atmosphere. Its a very big one bedroom with all amenities. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
name: Beautiful 1 bedroom in the heart of Greenpoint
review:
The thing we enjoyed the most about the apartment was the location. Walkable to many restaurants, shops, grocery stores, pharmacies, etc. Very convenient also to the subway. It took us about 15 minutes to get to Rockefeller Center and 15 minutes (by car) to family who live in Queens. It is quite spacious - lots of room for my husband, our baby, and me. 
We found the linens (bedding, towels, and pillows) to be quite minimal and the apartment to be quite worn in spots. Also, we were not able to regulate the heat and it was hot!
